name: codemuse
description: AI Onboarding and peer programming assistant.

scripts.sync:scip-python: rsync -ax --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='.git/' ../scip-python/* ./packages/scip-python && npm install --workspace=pyright-root && cd packages/scip-python/packages/pyright-scip && npm run build
scripts.sync:scip-typescript: cd ../scip-typescript && npm run build && cd ../codemuse && rsync -ax --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='.git/' ../scip-typescript/* ./packages/scip-typescript

author: CodeMuse <contact@codemuse.app>
